alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Hampden; Hampshire; Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 3:38PM EDT until August 23 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL WORCESTER...SOUTHEASTERN HAMPSHIRE...SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN AND EAST CENTRAL HAMPDEN COUNTIES... At 338 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Belchertown, or 7 miles southeast of Amherst, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Reports of trees down in South Hadley. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Locations impacted include... Amherst, Ludlow, Belchertown, Wilbraham, Palmer, Ware, Granby, Hadley, Warren, West Brookfield, Hardwick, Shutesbury, Pelham, Petersham, New Braintree and New Salem. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
